question: I begin your sentences. What am I?
If I drink, I die, if I eat, I'm fine. What am I?
Cloud is my mother, wind is my father.I come down but never go up. What am I?
I repeat only the last word you say. The more I repeat, the softer I got. I cannot be seen but can be heard. What am I?
What color can you eat?
What body part is pronounced as one letter but written with three, only two different letters are used??
You are my brother, but I am not your brother. Who am I?
The answer for I shrink smaller every time I take a bath. What am I?
I sleep by day, I fly by night. I have no feathers to aid my flight. What am I?
What starts with the letter t, is filled with t and ends in t?
I belong to you but others use me more often than you do. What am I?
I am an odd number. Take away one letter and I become even. What number am I?
What is an astronaut's favorite key on a keyboard?
They come out at night without being called.They are lost in the day without being stolen. What are they?
What has a head and a tail, but no body or legs?
What has teeth but no mouth?
I am easy to waste and unstoppable. What am I?
What has a head and a tail, but no body or legs?
I start with “e” end with “e”. I have whole countries inside me. What am I?
I have a face and two hands but I have no arms and legs six plus seven is one what am I?
What comes in many different sizes but is always only 1 foot long?
I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?
What building has the most stories?
Tuesday, Sam and Peter went to a restaurant to eat lunch. After eating lunch, they paid the bill.Sam and Peter did not pay the bill, so who did?
What kind of tree can you carry in your hand?
What kind of room has no doors or windows?
I'm an animal. I love marching. I always wear a tuxedo. What am I?
Roast,boast, coast,post. what do you put in a toaster?
Tear one off and scratch my head, what once was red is black instead! What is it?
I have four fingers and a thumb but I'm not living. What am I?
What starts with “p” and ends with “orn” and is really popular in the movie industry?
What word begins and ends with an 'E' but only has one letter?
What is full of holes but still holds water?
You hold my tail while I fish for you. What am I?
What can you catch but not throw?
What can hold a car but can't lift a feather?
What invention lets you look right through a wall?
The more it dries, the wetter it becomes. What is it?
What gets bigger the more you take away from it?
What is so delicate that saying its name breaks it?
I have six faces but not even one body connected, 21 eyes in total but cannot see. What am I?
The answer for If two is Company and three is a Crowd, What are four and five?
What is the saddest fruit?
I have a neck but no head. I have a body but no arm. I have a bottom but no leg. What am I?
Poor people have it. Rich people need it. If you eat it you die. what is it?
You walk into a room with a rabbit holding a carrot, a pig eating slop, and a chimp holding a banana.Which animal in the room is the smartest animal in the room?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
I am gentle enough to soothe your skin, light enough to fly in the sky, strong enough to crack rocks. What am I?
I have a neck and no head, two arms but no hands. I'm with you to school, I'm with you to work. What am I??
I walk on 4 legs when I was little, 2 legs when I was strong, and 3 legs when I was old. What am I?
What side of a cat has the most fur?
What is easy to get into, but hard to get out of?
What gets broken without being held?
I'm tall when I'm young. I'm short when I'm old. I can light up your world. What am I?
What do you get when you mix lemons with gunpowder?
Mr.Red lives in the red house.Mr.Blue lives in the blue house. Mrs. Pink lives in the pink house? Who lives in the white house?
I have an eye, but can't see. I usually have to work with something in my eye. What am I?
Given them to the girls whenever, And they'll be best friends forever. Shiny, pretty stones, Bought with massive loans.
I am lighter than air but a hundred people cannot lift me. Careful, I am fragile. What am I?
When you take away the whole from me, there is always some left. What am I?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
What goes through towns and over hills but never moves?
What time of day, when written in a capital letters, is the same forwards, backwards and upside down?
I am a kind of coat that can only be put on when wet. What am I?
Soft, hairy, from door to door. I am the pet that always stays on the floor. What am I?
What is it that is deaf, dumb and blind and always tells the truth?
I cannot be other than what I am, until the man who made me dies. Power and glory will fall to me, only when he last closes his eyes. Who am I?
What three letters change a boy into a man?
The last man on Earth received a phone call, who was the caller?
Tear off my skin and I won't cry but you will. What am I?
What is harder to catch the faster you run?
Never resting, never still, Silently moving from hill to hill, I do not walk, run or trot, But all is cool where I am not. What am I?
I cannot be burned in fire or drowned in water. What am I?
I'm a word that is not even strange. What am I?
What gets sharper the more you use it?
Fatherless and Motherless, born without sin. Roared when it entered the world, And never spoke again.What's it?
Who is the most foreign visitor you could imagine?
I go up and I go down, towards the sky and the ground. I'm present and past tense too, Let's go for a ride, me and you. What am I?
What can be heard in court or used to carry briefs?
If you are looking for I touch the Earth, I touch the sky, but if I touch you, you'll likely die. What am I?
Walk on the living, they don't even mumble, Walk on the dead, they mutter and grumble. What are they?
I have a head but never weeps. I have a bed but never sleep. I can run but never walks. I have a bank but no money. What am I?
Mr.and Mrs. Mustard have five daughters and each daughter has one brother. How many people are in the Mustard family?
Fashions change but what can a person wear that is never out of style?
If you drop a yellow hat in the Red Sea what does it become?
I cover what is real and hide what is true, But sometimes I bring out the courage in you. What am I?
Who is your mother's only sister's son's brother's aunt's daughter's sister's father?
What goes in the water black and comes out red?
What has 88 keys but can't open a single door?
What always goes to bed with its shoes on?
You cannot keep me until you have given me. What am I?
What type of house weighs the least?
What do you call a boomerang that doesn't come back?
I can fly but have no wings. I can cry but I have no eyes. Wherever I go, darkness follows me. What am I?
What jumps when it walks and sits when it stands?
What is black and white and is red all over?
Railroad Crossing, look out for the cars. Can you spell that, without any R's?
The answer for What type of dress can never be worn?
If you have it, you don't share it. If you share it, you don't have it. What is it?
A man shaves several times a day, yet he still has a beard. Who is this man?
It flies around all day but never goes anywhere? What is it?
I know a word of letters three. Add two, and fewer there will be. What is the word?
With a halo of water and a tongue of wood, stone as skin long I stood. What am I?
You do not want me when you don't have me, but when you have me you don't want to lose me. What am I?
What goes around and around the wood but never goes into the wood?
I can make arrows fly. I can make kites soar. What am I?
I am a seed with three letters in my name. Take away the last two and I still sound the same. What am I?
What can you lose that will cause other people to lose theirs too?
I have roots nobody sees. I am taller than trees Up, Up I go but I never grow. What am I?
What runs around a soccer field but never moves?
I am always in front of you but yet I am never here. What am I?
What can go up a chimney down, but can't go down a chimney up?
I am heavy forward, but backwards I'm not. What am I?
If lightning strikes an orchestra who is the one most likely to get hit?
What is the musical part of a turkey?
I'm where yesterday follows today and tomorrow is in the middle. What am I?
I have a name written on me, but it isn’t my name. Men plant me, but I never grow. They look at me and see their future, rotting in my bloom. What am I?
What do people spend a lot of money on it every year, but never want to use it?
I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter but can't go outside. What am I?
I am an insect, half of my name is another insect. I am similar to the name of a famous band. What am I?
I go around in circles, But always straight ahead Never complain, no matter where I am led. What am I?
You can see me in water, but I never get wet. What am I?
What goes up and down but doesn't move?
A butcher is 6 feet tall and wears size 12 shoes. What does he weigh?
I ask no questions but receive a lot of answers. What am I?
What's orange and sounds like a parrot?
What's orange and sounds like a parrot?
I make billions of dollars selling windows. Who am I?
You throw away my outside, you cook my inside. Then you eat my outside and you throw away my inside. What am I?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed, The finger I touch, Will soon turn red.
My rings are not worth much, but they do tell my age. What am I?
What loses its head every morning and gets it back every night?
Mary's father has 5 daughters. Nana, Nene, Nini, Nono. What is the 5th daughter's name?
I am so simple that I can only point. Yet I guide men all over the world.
Born of sorrow, grows with age,You need a lot to be a sage. What is it?
I have one eye, See near and far, I hold the moments you treasure, And the things that make you weep.
He has married many women, but has never been married. Who is he?
I hold two meanings. With one I may be broken, with the other I hold on. What am I?
I am a ship that can be made to ride the greatest waves. I am not built by objects, but built by minds. What am I?
I am a ship that can be made to ride the greatest waves. I am not built by objects, but built by minds. What am I?
Six letters it contains. Take away the last and only twelve remains. What is the word?
Who plays when he works and works when he plays?
What goes through a door but never goes in and never comes out?
Lighter than what Im made of, more of me is hidden than is seen. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What are they?
What do you call a chicken with no arms, no legs and no body?
I can bring tears to your eyes; resurrect the dead, make you smile, and reverse time. I form in an instant but I last a lifetime. What am I?
The more there is the less you see. What is it?
You have to travel far before you turn it over. What is it?
What has 3 feet but no toes?
